snippet: In an address at the Pentagon this morning, President Obama laid out his administration's new strategic vision for the nation's defense.
abstract: In an address at the Pentagon this morning, President Obama laid out his administration's new strategic vision for the nation's defense.
lead_paragraph: In an address at the Pentagon this morning, President Obama laid out his administration's new strategic vision for the nation's defense, calling for a leaner military that maintains a strong presence in the Pacific, vigilance against the nuclear ambitions of North Korea and Iran, smaller conventional ground forces and higher-tech air power.

headline.main: A Recap of the Pentagon Briefing on Defense Cuts

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
